pageContext.claim: “Even in Ohio, the great state of Ohio, yesterday, General Motors, at my very strong urging, to put it mildly, very strong urging -- I wasn't even nice about it, but I appreciate what they did -- they sold the beautiful plant, Lordstown. They sold that beautiful plant to a very, very good company that is going to make electric trucks.”
pageContext.analysis: The sale of this GM plant in Lordstown, Ohio, is not a done deal and there are questions about the potential buyer's viability.
